title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved?   Here at Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument, there are several ways to get involved!     Search for job announcements (NOTE: Alibates Flint Quarries shares staff with nearby Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and all USAjobs.gov announcements are listed under Lake Meredith) Volunteer your time and skills Join the Friends of Alibates and Lake Meredith and check out the latest Friends' Group project!
